name: Popular languages

api_list.name: Language by id
Languages
api_list.description: Get list of most popular  languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://popular-languages.p.rapidapi.com/8vtZVq/languages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "popular-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://popular-languages.p.rapidapi.com/8vtZVq/languages/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "popular-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
